summary: Completed comprehensive testing of PriceHive collaborative price sharing app. Backend APIs fully functional (100% pass rate), frontend core features working with some UI/navigation issues identified.

ui_bugs.issue: JavaScript runtime errors: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'
Admin navigation link not consistently visible after login
Reaction button selectors not working correctly in some cases

integration_issues.issue: User gets logged out when navigating directly to protected URLs

passed_tests: Backend admin CRUD operations (categories, brands, supermarkets, units, products)
Backend shopping lists and price management
Frontend landing page with hero section and features
Frontend shopping list creation and management
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend Select component value prop errors causing JavaScript runtime issues. Improve session management for direct URL navigation. Ensure Admin navigation link is consistently visible for admin users.
